name: Skii Man 2
description:
Skii Man is a 2D platform with hand drawn sprites and animations by me

I drew everything in Adobe Illustrator 

Slippery platformer. Map out your jumps carefully

Meet a pretty cool cast of animated characters

You can look up and down and make him dance kind of 

known bugs: 

-if you hold forward after jumping the animations won't play

-getting stuck on the spikes platform

Questions:

-how's the movement? (the jump, the control, etc.)

-did you have fun? (fun is important)
